CustomField.description: Calculates number of workdays between today and requested launch date of campaign
CustomField.formula:
(
(5 * ( FLOOR( ( Scheduled_Tactic_Start__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Scheduled_Tactic_Start__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( today() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( today() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
)
-(Estimated_Project_Duration__c)
CustomField.label: Business Days Before Latest Start
